Banner.Description: As a Mobile Software Engineer with over 8+ years of experience, I have a comprehensive understanding of both client-side and server-side technologies. My expertise covers the entire software development life cycle, including requirements analysis, system design, coding, testing, deployment, and maintenance. This extensive experience enables me to integrate technical and business perspectives, ensuring that my mobile solutions are technically sound and aligned with business objectives.
MainTech.Title: Main Skills & Education
SecondTech.Title: Well known
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In front-end development, I excel in creating engaging and responsive mobile interfaces. I am proficient in using cutting-edge technologies such as Android, iOS, and Flutter that allow me to build cross-platform mobile applications that offer a native-like user experience.

I possess a keen sense of design and usability, which ensures that each app I develop is intuitive and user-friendly. My skill in transforming complex designs into dynamic and efficient mobile applications demonstrates my commitment to delivering exceptional user experiences.
I have experience developing scalable and efficient APIs and services on the back end using technologies like .NET Core and Azure.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Lead Developer
Description: Architectural Oversight: As the Lead Developer, I oversee and make critical decisions regarding our software architecture. I ensure our system is scalable, maintainable, and follows best practices.

Mentoring and Team Development: I take pride in nurturing the growth of junior developers on my team. This includes conducting code reviews, offering one-on-one mentoring sessions, and guiding them through technical challenges.

Code Quality and Standards: I ensure that our codebase maintains a high standard of quality. This involves implementing and upholding coding standards, conducting regular code reviews, and integrating robust testing frameworks and continuous integration tools.

Project Management and Task Delegation: Working either independently or in tandem with project managers, I prioritize tasks, break down intricate projects into manageable pieces, and assign them to team members based on their specific skills and expertise.

Stakeholder Communication: I act as a liaison between the technical team and stakeholders, ensuring that technical nuances are effectively communicated and that project requirements are accurately transformed into technical solutions.

Research and Technology Evaluation: Staying abreast of the latest technologies and tools is crucial in my role. I evaluate and decide on the adoption of new technologies that can enhance our projects or benefit the organization as a whole.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Pokemon
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Pokemon search engine that uses the pokeapi. Object-oriented programming was used to organize the information of the pokemons along with their respective image.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Coming soon page
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a two-column split page to be used as a 'Coming soon page'. Scheduled to be a fully responsive design. It has a form field to subscribe by email.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four card feature section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page that has a minimal design, listing four features on four cards. Input animations are done with angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a Figma layout. Angular was used for development together with SASS and CSS GRID.
